verses.verse: But <S%G5578>false<s%> <S%G5578>prophets<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G1096>arose<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> the <S%G2992>people,<s%> <S%G5613>just<s%> as there will <S%G2532>also<s%> be <S%G5572>false<s%> <S%G5572>teachers<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> you, <S%G3748>who<s%> will <S%G3919>secretly<s%> <S%G3919>introduce<s%> <S%G684>destructive<s%> <S%G139>heresies,<s%> <S%G2532>even<s%> <S%G720>denying<s%> the <S%G1203>Master<s%> who <S%G59>bought<s%> them, <S%G1863>bringing<s%> <S%G5031>swift<s%> <S%G684>destruction<s%> upon <S%G1438>themselves.<s%>
And <S%G4183>many<s%> will <S%G1811>follow<s%> their <S%G766>sensuality,<s%> and <S%G1223>because<s%> of them the <S%G3598>way<s%> of the <S%G225>truth<s%> will be <S%G987>maligned;<s%>

and in [their] <S%G4124>greed<s%> they will <S%G1710>exploit<s%> you with <S%G4112>false<s%> <S%G3056>words;<s%> their <S%G2917>judgment<s%> from <S%G1597>long<s%> <S%G1597>ago<s%> is not <S%G691>idle,<s%> and their <S%G684>destruction<s%> is not <S%G3573>asleep.<s%>

For <S%G1487>if<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> did not <S%G5339>spare<s%> <S%G32>angels<s%> when they <S%G264>sinned,<s%> but <S%G5020>cast<s%> them into <S%G5020>hell<s%> and <S%G3860>committed<s%> them to <S%G4618>pits<s%> of <S%G2217>darkness,<s%> <S%G5083>reserved<s%> for <S%G2920>judgment;<s%>

and did not <S%G5339>spare<s%> the <S%G744>ancient<s%> <S%G2889>world,<s%> but <S%G5442>preserved<s%> <S%G3575>Noah,<s%> a <S%G2783>preacher<s%> of <S%G1343>righteousness,<s%> with <S%G3590>seven<s%> <S%G3590>others,<s%> when He <S%G1863>brought<s%> a <S%G2627>flood<s%> upon the <S%G2889>world<s%> of the <S%G765>ungodly;<s%>

and [if] He <S%G2632>condemned<s%> the <S%G4172>cities<s%> of <S%G4670>Sodom<s%> and <S%G1116>Gomorrah<s%> to <S%G2692>destruction<s%> by <S%G5077>reducing<s%> [them] to <S%G5077>ashes,<s%> having <S%G5087>made<s%> them an <S%G5262>example<s%> to those who <S%G3195>would<s%> <S%G764>live<s%> <S%G764>ungodly<s%> <S%G3195>thereafter;<s%>
and [if] He <S%G4506>rescued<s%> <S%G1342>righteous<s%> <S%G3091>Lot,<s%> <S%G2669>oppressed<s%> by the <S%G766>sensual<s%> <S%G391>conduct<s%> of <S%G113>unprincipled<s%> <S%G113>men<s%>

(for by <S%G990>what<s%> he <S%G990>saw<s%> and <S%G189>heard<s%> [that] <S%G1342>righteous<s%> <S%G1342>man,<s%> while <S%G1460>living<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> them, <S%G928>felt<s%> [his] <S%G1342>righteous<s%> <S%G5590>soul<s%> <S%G928>tormented<s%> <S%G2250>day<s%> <S%G1537>after<s%> <S%G2250>day<s%> with [their] <S%G459>lawless<s%> <S%G2041>deeds<s%>),

[then] the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G3609>knows<s%> <S%G3609>how<s%> to <S%G4506>rescue<s%> the <S%G2152>godly<s%> from <S%G3986>temptation,<s%> and to <S%G5083>keep<s%> the <S%G94>unrighteous<s%> under <S%G2849>punishment<s%> for the <S%G2250>day<s%> of <S%G2920>judgment,<s%>

and <S%G3122>especially<s%> <S%G3588>those<s%> who <S%G4198>indulge<s%> the <S%G4561>flesh<s%> in [its] <S%G3394>corrupt<s%> <S%G1939>desires<s%> and <S%G2706>despise<s%> <S%G2963>authority.<s%> <S%G5113>Daring,<s%> self-willed, they do not <S%G5141>tremble<s%> when they <S%G987>revile<s%> angelic <S%G1391>majesties,<s%>

<S%G3699>whereas<s%> <S%G32>angels<s%> who are <S%G3173>greater<s%> in <S%G2479>might<s%> and <S%G1411>power<s%> do not <S%G5342>bring<s%> a <S%G989>reviling<s%> <S%G2920>judgment<s%> <S%G2596>against<s%> them <S%G3844>before<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord.<s%>

But <S%G3778>these,<s%> <S%G5613>like<s%> <S%G249>unreasoning<s%> <S%G2226>animals,<s%> <S%G1080>born<s%> as <S%G5446>creatures<s%> of <S%G5446>instinct<s%> to be <S%G259>captured<s%> and <S%G5356>killed,<s%> <S%G987>reviling<s%> <S%G1722>where<s%> <S%G3739><s%> they <S%G50>have<s%> <S%G50>no<s%> <S%G50>knowledge,<s%> will in the <S%G5356>destruction<s%> of <S%G3778>those<s%> creatures <S%G2532>also<s%> be <S%G5351>destroyed,<s%>

suffering <S%G91>wrong<s%> as the <S%G3408>wages<s%> of <S%G93>doing<s%> <S%G93>wrong.<s%> They <S%G2233>count<s%> it a <S%G2237>pleasure<s%> to <S%G5172>revel<s%> in the <S%G2250>daytime.<s%> They are <S%G4696>stains<s%> and <S%G3470>blemishes,<s%> <S%G1792>reveling<s%> in their <S%G539>deceptions,<s%> as they <S%G4910>carouse<s%> with you,

<S%G2192>having<s%> <S%G3788>eyes<s%> <S%G3324>full<s%> of <S%G3428>adultery<s%> and that <S%G180>never<s%> <S%G180>cease<s%> from <S%G266>sin,<s%> <S%G1185>enticing<s%> <S%G793>unstable<s%> <S%G5590>souls,<s%> <S%G2192>having<s%> a <S%G2588>heart<s%> <S%G1128>trained<s%> in <S%G4124>greed,<s%> <S%G2671>accursed<s%> <S%G5043>children;<s%>

<S%G2641>forsaking<s%> the <S%G2117>right<s%> <S%G3598>way<s%> they have <S%G4105>gone<s%> <S%G4105>astray,<s%> having <S%G1811>followed<s%> the <S%G3598>way<s%> of <S%G903>Balaam,<s%> the [son] of <S%G7505>Beor,<s%> <S%G3739>who<s%> <S%G25>loved<s%> the <S%G3408>wages<s%> of <S%G93>unrighteousness,<s%>

but he <S%G2192>received<s%> a <S%G1649>rebuke<s%> for his <S%G2398>own<s%> <S%G3892>transgression;<s%> [for] a <S%G880>dumb<s%> <S%G5268>donkey,<s%> <S%G5350>speaking<s%> with a <S%G5456>voice<s%> of a <S%G444>man,<s%> <S%G2967>restrained<s%> the <S%G3913>madness<s%> of the <S%G4396>prophet.<s%>

<S%G3778>These<s%> are <S%G4077>springs<s%> <S%G504>without<s%> <S%G504>water,<s%> and <S%G3658>mists<s%> <S%G1643>driven<s%> by a <S%G2978>storm,<s%> for <S%G3739>whom<s%> the <S%G2217>black<s%> <S%G4655>darkness<s%> has been <S%G5083>reserved.<s%>

For <S%G5350>speaking<s%> out <S%G5246>arrogant<s%> [words] of <S%G3153>vanity<s%> they <S%G1185>entice<s%> by <S%G4561>fleshly<s%> <S%G1939>desires,<s%> by <S%G766>sensuality,<s%> <S%G3588>those<s%> who <S%G3643>barely<s%> <S%G668>escape<s%> from the ones who <S%G390>live<s%> in <S%G4106>error,<s%>

<S%G1861>promising<s%> them <S%G1657>freedom<s%> while they <S%G846>themselves<s%> are <S%G1401>slaves<s%> of <S%G5356>corruption;<s%> for by <S%G3739>what<s%> a <S%G5100>man<s%> is <S%G2274>overcome,<s%> by <S%G3778>this<s%> he is <S%G1402>enslaved.<s%>

For <S%G1487>if<s%> after they have <S%G668>escaped<s%> the <S%G3393>defilements<s%> of the <S%G2889>world<s%> by the <S%G1922>knowledge<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> and <S%G4990>Savior<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> they are <S%G3825>again<s%> <S%G1707>entangled<s%> in them and are <S%G2274>overcome,<s%> the <S%G2078>last<s%> state has <S%G1096>become<s%> <S%G5501>worse<s%> for them than the <S%G4413>first.<s%>

For it would be <S%G2909>better<s%> for them not to have <S%G1921>known<s%> the <S%G3598>way<s%> of <S%G1343>righteousness,<s%> <S%G2228>than<s%> having <S%G1921>known<s%> it, to <S%G5290>turn<s%> <S%G5290>away<s%> from the <S%G40>holy<s%> <S%G1785>commandment<s%> <S%G3860>delivered<s%> to them.

It has <S%G4819>happened<s%> to them according to the <S%G227>true<s%> <S%G3942>proverb,<s%> "A <S%G2965>dog<s%> <S%G1994>returns<s%> to its <S%G2398>own<s%> <S%G1829>vomit,<s%>" and, "A <S%G5300>sow,<s%> after <S%G3068>washing,<s%> [returns] to <S%G2946>wallowing<s%> in the <S%G1004>mire.<s%>"
